TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SynthesizerEmphasis extends System.Enum

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs.Emphasis%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses `SynthesiszerEmphasis` to describe the emphasis of a viseme when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is raised. The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs.Emphasis%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses `SynthesiszerEmphasis` to describe the emphasis of a phoneme when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerEmphasis Emphasized = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates a low level of synthesizer emphasis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerEmphasis Stressed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates a high level of synthesizer emphasis.
